segments.text: What a ridiculous scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is clueless, fussing over one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle at her feet, and she stands in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids stealing cookies on that death-trap stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is all stretched out, grabbing handfuls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just enabling him, hand begging.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks fine, but in here it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing this kind of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies aren't worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
